pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast JSON Parser and Generator // A fast JSON parser, generator and validator which converts JSON data to/from R objects. The standard R data types are supported (e.g. logical, numeric, integer) with configurable handling of NULL and NA values. Data frames, atomic vectors and lists are all supported as data containers translated to/from JSON. This implementation is a wrapper around the 'yyjson' 'C' library which is available from https://github.com/ibireme/yyjson.
